job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description:
Job Description
A leading loan provider and engineering distribution center in Florida is looking to scale up, these guys are on the cutting edge of loan distrubiton. More specifically, provide loan engineering systems for mortgage lenders.
A strong engineer will have experience in C#, Asp.netCore, Web API, Restful web services, Javascript, angular2+ , React, Azure, and SQL. You will be working on a core usage, analytics, and loaning web application.
Required Skills & Experience
C#
Asp.net
Core or MVC
JavaScript
Azure or SQL
Desired Skills & Experience
Web API Building, not consuming
Restful web services
BS in CS
Angular2+ or React
What You Will Be Doing
Tech Breakdown
0% Red Hat Linux
100% Windows Server 2010
Daily Responsibilities
90% Hands On
0% Management Duties
10% Team Collaboration
The Offer
Competitive Salary: Up to $170K/year, DOE
You Will Receive The Following Benefits
Medical Insurance & Health Savings Account (HSA)
401(k)
Paid Sick Time Leave
Pre-tax Commuter Benefit
Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis now and in the future.
This position does not offer sponsorship.
Jobspring Partners, part of the Motion Recruitment network, provides IT Staffing Solutions (Contract, Contract-to-Hire, and Direct Hire) across 10 major North American markets. Our unique expertise in today’s highest demand tech skill sets, paired with our deep networks and knowledge of our local technology markets, results in an exemplary track record with candidates and clients.
Posted By:
Brendan McLean
